alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 2:48PM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND STRONG WINDS FOR THE MOUNTAINS THIS WEEKEND... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
